00315 struct UserInput {
00316     std::vector<std::string> labels; 
00317     Vector_double defaults; 
00318     std::string title;               
00320 
00321 
00325     UserInput(
00326             const std::vector<std::string>& labels_=std::vector<std::string>(0),
00327             const Vector_double& defaults_=Vector_double(0),
00328             std::string title_="\0"
00329     ) : labels(labels_),defaults(defaults_),title(title_)
00330     {
00331                 if (defaults.size()!=labels.size()) {
00332                     defaults.resize(labels.size());
00333                     std::fill(defaults.begin(), defaults.end(), 0.0);
00334                 }
00335     }
00336 };

00339 class Event {
00340 public:
00342     explicit Event(std::size_t start, std::size_t peak, std::size_t size, bool discard_ = false) : 
00343         eventStartIndex(start), eventPeakIndex(peak), eventSize(size), discard(discard_) { }
00344     
00346     ~Event() {}
00347 
00349 
00350     std::size_t GetEventStartIndex() const { return eventStartIndex; }
00351 
00353 
00354     std::size_t GetEventPeakIndex() const { return eventPeakIndex; }
00355 
00357 
00358     std::size_t GetEventSize() const { return eventSize; }
00359 
00361 
00362     bool GetDiscard() const { return discard; }
00363 
00365 
00366     void SetEventStartIndex( std::size_t value ) { eventStartIndex = value; }
00367 
00369 
00370     void SetEventPeakIndex( std::size_t value ) { eventPeakIndex = value; }
00371 
00373 
00374     void SetEventSize( std::size_t value ) { eventSize = value; }
00375 
00377 
00378     void SetDiscard( bool value ) { discard = value; }
00379 
00381     void ToggleStatus() { discard = !discard; }
00382 
00383 private:
00384     std::size_t eventStartIndex;
00385     std::size_t eventPeakIndex;
00386     std::size_t eventSize;
00387     bool discard;
00388 };

00408 struct Plugin {
00410 
00414     Plugin(
00415             const wxString& menuEntry_,
00416             const PluginFunc& pluginFunc_,
00417             const UserInput& input_=UserInput()
00418     ) : menuEntry(menuEntry_),pluginFunc(pluginFunc_),input(input_)
00419     {
00420         id = n_plugins;
00421         n_plugins++;
00422     }
00423     
00425     ~Plugin() { }
00426 
00427     int id;                
00428     static int n_plugins;  
00429     wxString menuEntry;    
00430     PluginFunc pluginFunc; 
00431     UserInput input;       
00432 };

00547 #ifdef WITH_PSLOPE
00548 
00549 enum pslope_mode_beg {
00550     psBeg_manualMode, /*< Set the start Slope cursor manually. */
00551     psBeg_footMode,   /*< Set the start Slope cursor to the beginning of an event. */
00552     psBeg_thrMode,    /*< Set the start Slope cursor to a threshold. */
00553     psBeg_t50Mode,    /*< Set the start Slope cursor to the half-width of an event*/
00554     psBeg_undefined
00555 };
00556 
00558 enum pslope_mode_end {
00559     psEnd_manualMode, /*< Set the end Slope cursor manually. */
00560     psEnd_t50Mode,   /*< Set the Slope cursor to the half-width of an event. */
00561     psEnd_DeltaTMode,  /*< Set the Slope cursor to a given distance from the first cursor. */
00562     psEnd_peakMode,    /*< Set the Slope cursor to the peak. */
00563     psEnd_undefined
00564 };
00565 
00566 #endif // WITH_PSLOPE
00567 
00568 #else
00569 #endif // Module only

00636 inline int stf::round(double toRound) {
00637     return toRound <= 0.0 ? int(toRound-0.5) : int(toRound+0.5);
00638 }
